author: lemanic.ca
title: Ground News - Matane—Baie-Comeau—Godbout: crossings are canceled - Le Haute Côte-Nord
text:
Summary by lemanic.ca The unfavorable temperature and navigation conditions force the cancellation of the scheduled crossings between Matane and the North Shore on March 22. The management of the Matane—Baie-Comeau—Godbout ferry informs that deposits on reservations will be refunded. The post Matane—Baie-Comeau—Godbout: The crossings are cancelled appeared first on Le Haute Côte-Nord. Share menu 0 Articles 0 Articles All Left Center Right
